summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3924 for the improvement of the alley between blocks 11 and 12, The University Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue Northeast and 7th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street and East 50th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47777, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
